$interpreted: Ru-yi: Hooray, the snow's stopping~!
Hutchinson: Yes, thanks to all these... pillars? Buildings? Whatever they are, they've kept us out of the wind's way~
Sophie: It's a good spot. Where are we, Eidatyr?
Eidatyr: ...It's a sacred altar of the Saga clan.
Sophie: A sacred altar!?
Eidatyr: We... The Saga clan believe the aurora can show people their destiny. But only the Grand Sorcerer can understand the signs.
Eidatyr: The Grand Sorcerer comes here to host the rituals. By following the trails of the aurora, the fate bestowed by the Aurora Goddess can be made known to the people.
Hanbei: Hmph, that sounds grand. Are we allowed to just barge in here?
Eidatyr: Don't be ridiculous... Of course we're not. We'll be put to death if the clan catch us trampling over their holy grounds.
Ru-yi: Wh-wh-whaa!? That's terrifying!! Let's get out of here, Sophie!
Sophie: B-but the snowstorm...
Eidatyr: Even the members of the clan are strictly forbidden from entering. So save your breath, nobody's gonna come in and find us here.
Eidatyr: I came here once as a kid, too, just to try my luck. Unless the Grand Sorcerer happens to visit, nobody's gonna bother us...
Clan Villager: Who's that I hear? Did somebody lose their way around here?
Eidatyr: It's the aurora! Don't tell me it's time for Lysfete, right now? Could this get any worse!?
Clan Villager: Yup, you said it. The patterns of the aurora have been calculated. Lysfete is only a few days away.
Clan Villager: The Grand Sorcerer is currently purifying herself for the ritual. You should return to the village and wait patiently, do not disturb her...
Clan Villager: Wait. I thought you were a Northerner from the sound of your accent, but you're sure dressed funny... Are you outsiders!?
Clan Villager: What are you doing, dressed up like the clan and trespassing on our holy grounds!
Ru-yi: Gwaagh, they're angry with us! We're gonna be killed!
Sophie: U-uh, we're not bad people, we just needed to escape the blizzard...
Clan Villager: A likely story! Those who trespass on our sacred sites shall be put to death!!
Sophie: Wait, we can explain...
Eidatyr: They're of a kind with Rune. They can't be reasoned with. The only way out is with a fight!
Sophie: Well, you're not exactly a model of diplomacy yourself, Eidatyr...
Clan Villager: ...Strange. Where have I seen you before...
Eidatyr: ...Tch...
Clan Villager: Yeah, I know you! You're Ozen's kid daughter, the one that was banished to Westport! Eidatyr!
Eidatyr: ......
Clan Villager: So, the sinner who was bewitched by the sea monster dares to set foot in our holy land!
Clan Villager: Ozen's long dead. You're all that remains, you stubborn thing. I'd have killed you both long ago, if only I knew how things would turn out!
Sophie: Hey! You're taking this way too far!
Eidatyr: Haha... Ahahaha!!
Eidatyr: You talk as if you ever gave us a chance in the first place. Don't make me laugh.
Eidatyr: Well, here's your chance to try! I'll peel those runes right off your skin and leave you to die in the snow! How about it!?
???: —Stop, child.
Eidatyr: ...You're...
Clan Villager: Grand Sorcerer Gretta!!
Gretta: Stop, both of you. You should be siblings, not enemies.
Eidatyr: Don't you lecture me, goddamn it! I'm not that same kid you drove away all those years ago!
Gretta: Eidatyr Ingria, I delivered you to this world, as I did your father Ozen before you.
Gretta: Even with your hair turned to white and your teeth dropping out... You'll always be a child of the north to me.
Gretta: ...A treasured, long-lost child.
Eidatyr: ......
Eidatyr: ......
Eidatyr: ...Fine. If I'd known the Grand Sorcerer would be here, I'd never have come. I can't wait to get out of this cursed place.
Gretta: Eidatyr...
Eidatyr: Shut it.
Sophie: W-wait! What's the matter, Eidatyr?
Hanbei: Yeah, you just beat the crap out of a bunch of 'em, and now you're scared of some little girl?
Eidatyr: Who's scared? I just don't want to harm her. Would any of you beat on your own grandmother?
Sophie: Grandmother? What do you mean?
Eidatyr: This damn aurora... No end to my troubles...
Ru-yi: Aiyeeee, more monsters!!
Clan Villager: They're coming for the sacred altar!
Gretta: No! Don't let them destroy the sundial!
Clan Villager: Wait for us, Grand Sorcerer! It's dangerous!!
Eidatyr: ...The Grand Sorcerer of the Saga clan will be reincarnated.
Eidatyr: She appoints a successor from the clan shortly before the end. Not long after, she'll reawaken within their body.
Eidatyr: With every awakening, she retains her former memories and powers.
Hutchinson: So... that means...
Eidatyr: Before there was a clan, there was the Grand Sorcerer. She's more ancient than all of us put together.
Ru-yi: So they're all the same person, and it's just her vessel that looks so young...
Eidatyr: She's watched over the clan for many generations.
Eidatyr: I called her granny back when I was a wee thing. She was always looking out for me...
Eidatyr: Of course, she had a different vessel back then.
Hanbei: Sophie, doesn't this reincarnation business remind you of...
Sophie: Yeah, it's just like we heard before...
Eidatyr: Like what?
Sophie: Uh, well...
Gretta: Eidatyr. I have persuaded them.
Gretta: I believe you were right. These southerners come bearing ill. We must inform Clan Mother Valdrir immediately.
Eidatyr: But—
Gretta: As for your transgression in bringing outsiders to our sacred grounds, we'll deal with it later. For now, please return to the village with us.

Model.Text: Hooray, the snow's stopping~!
Yes, thanks to all these... pillars? Buildings? Whatever they are, they've kept us out of the wind's way~
It's a good spot. Where are we, Eidatyr?
...It's a sacred altar of the Saga clan.
A sacred altar!?
We... The Saga clan believe the aurora can show people their destiny. But only the Grand Sorcerer can understand the signs.
The Grand Sorcerer comes here to host the rituals. By following the trails of the aurora, the fate bestowed by the Aurora Goddess can be made known to the people.
Hmph, that sounds grand. Are we allowed to just barge in here?
Don't be ridiculous... Of course we're not. We'll be put to death if the clan catch us trampling over their holy grounds.
Wh-wh-whaa!? That's terrifying!! Let's get out of here, Sophie!
B-but the snowstorm...
Even the members of the clan are strictly forbidden from entering. So save your breath, nobody's gonna come in and find us here.
I came here once as a kid, too, just to try my luck. Unless the Grand Sorcerer happens to visit, nobody's gonna bother us...
Who's that I hear? Did somebody lose their way around here?
It's the aurora! Don't tell me it's time for Lysfete, right now? Could this get any worse!?
Yup, you said it. The patterns of the aurora have been calculated. Lysfete is only a few days away.
The Grand Sorcerer is currently purifying herself for the ritual. You should return to the village and wait patiently, do not disturb her...
Wait. I thought you were a Northerner from the sound of your accent, but you're sure dressed funny... Are you outsiders!?
What are you doing, dressed up like the clan and trespassing on our holy grounds!
Gwaagh, they're angry with us! We're gonna be killed!
U-uh, we're not bad people, we just needed to escape the blizzard...
A likely story! Those who trespass on our sacred sites shall be put to death!!
Wait, we can explain...
They're of a kind with Rune. They can't be reasoned with. The only way out is with a fight!
Well, you're not exactly a model of diplomacy yourself, Eidatyr...
...Strange. Where have I seen you before...
Yeah, I know you! You're Ozen's kid daughter, the one that was banished to Westport! Eidatyr!
So, the sinner who was bewitched by the sea monster dares to set foot in our holy land!
Ozen's long dead. You're all that remains, you stubborn thing. I'd have killed you both long ago, if only I knew how things would turn out!
Hey! You're taking this way too far!
Haha... Ahahaha!!
You talk as if you ever gave us a chance in the first place. Don't make me laugh.
Well, here's your chance to try! I'll peel those runes right off your skin and leave you to die in the snow! How about it!?
—Stop, child.
...You're...
Grand Sorcerer Gretta!!
Stop, both of you. You should be siblings, not enemies.
Don't you lecture me, goddamn it! I'm not that same kid you drove away all those years ago!
Eidatyr Ingria, I delivered you to this world, as I did your father Ozen before you.
Even with your hair turned to white and your teeth dropping out... You'll always be a child of the north to me.
...A treasured, long-lost child.
...Fine. If I'd known the Grand Sorcerer would be here, I'd never have come. I can't wait to get out of this cursed place.
Eidatyr...
Shut it.
W-wait! What's the matter, Eidatyr?
Yeah, you just beat the crap out of a bunch of 'em, and now you're scared of some little girl?
Who's scared? I just don't want to harm her. Would any of you beat on your own grandmother?
Grandmother? What do you mean?
This damn aurora... No end to my troubles...
Aiyeeee, more monsters!!
They're coming for the sacred altar!
No! Don't let them destroy the sundial!
Wait for us, Grand Sorcerer! It's dangerous!!
...The Grand Sorcerer of the Saga clan will be reincarnated.
She appoints a successor from the clan shortly before the end. Not long after, she'll reawaken within their body.
With every awakening, she retains her former memories and powers.
So... that means...
Before there was a clan, there was the Grand Sorcerer. She's more ancient than all of us put together.
So they're all the same person, and it's just her vessel that looks so young...
She's watched over the clan for many generations.
I called her granny back when I was a wee thing. She was always looking out for me...
Of course, she had a different vessel back then.
Sophie, doesn't this reincarnation business remind you of...
Yeah, it's just like we heard before...
Like what?
Uh, well...
Eidatyr. I have persuaded them.
I believe you were right. These southerners come bearing ill. We must inform Clan Mother Valdrir immediately.
But—
As for your transgression in bringing outsiders to our sacred grounds, we'll deal with it later. For now, please return to the village with us.

What do you mean?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_21_004","SpeakerName":"Eidatyr","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0234","IconName":"h0234s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"This damn aurora... No end to my troubles...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Ru-yi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3189c3","IconName":"t3189c3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Aiyeeee, more monsters!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Clan Villager","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3641c3","IconName":"h3641c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"They're coming for the sacred altar!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_23_001","SpeakerName":"Gretta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0233","IconName":"h0233s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"No! Don't let them destroy the sundial!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_23_002","SpeakerName":"Clan Villager","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3641c3","IconName":"h3641c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Wait for us, Grand Sorcerer! It's dangerous!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Eidatyr","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0234","IconName":"h0234s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...S#%@! G*?%! M@#*!!!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_25_000","SpeakerName":"Eidatyr","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0234","IconName":"h0234s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...The Grand Sorcerer of the Saga clan will be reincarnated.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_25_001","SpeakerName":"Eidatyr","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0234","IconName":"h0234s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"She appoints a successor from the clan shortly before the end. Not long after, she'll reawaken within their body.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_25_002","SpeakerName":"Eidatyr","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0234","IconName":"h0234s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"With every awakening, she retains her former memories and powers.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Hutchinson","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3190c3","IconName":"h3190c3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So... that means...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_26_001","SpeakerName":"Eidatyr","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0234","IconName":"h0234s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Before there was a clan, there was the Grand Sorcerer. She's more ancient than all of us put together.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_26_002","SpeakerName":"Ru-yi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3189c3","IconName":"t3189c3_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So they're all the same person, and it's just her vessel that looks so young...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Eidatyr","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0234","IconName":"h0234s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"She's watched over the clan for many generations.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Eidatyr","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0234","IconName":"h0234s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I called her granny back when I was a wee thing. She was always looking out for me...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_27_002","SpeakerName":"Eidatyr","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0234","IconName":"h0234s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Of course, she had a different vessel back then.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Hanbei","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3191c3","IconName":"t3191c3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sophie, doesn't this reincarnation business remind you of...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_28_001","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yeah, it's just like we heard before...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Eidatyr","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0234","IconName":"h0234s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Like what?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_29_001","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Uh, well...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_29_002","SpeakerName":"Gretta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0233","IconName":"h0233s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Eidatyr. I have persuaded them.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Gretta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0233","IconName":"h0233s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I believe you were right. These southerners come bearing ill. We must inform Clan Mother Valdrir immediately.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_30_001","SpeakerName":"Eidatyr","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0234","IconName":"h0234s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But\u2014","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_407_005_dialog_english##_30_002","SpeakerName":"Gretta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0233","IconName":"h0233s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"As for your transgression in bringing outsiders to our sacred grounds, we'll deal with it later. For now, please return to the village with us.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
